name: TheChainsThatBind
description:
The Chains That Bind is a game for at least 4 players (a storyteller and three players) where, regardless of setting, you work together with the other players to enact scenes. Your characters support each other, gain mutual respect, and grow strong friendships to eventually break and destroy the chains of oppression that weigh down heavily upon them.
This game was designed initially to portray a prison uprising/escape but can be used to discuss things like depression, apathy, mistrust, love etc
